title: cmd/8g: regfree: reg not allocated
body:
go version devel +80c5e57e2ec3 Mon May 19 12:06:30 2014 +0400 + linux/amd64

Program is:
http://play.golang.org/p/qFo8_jcP4s

$ GOARCH=386 go build src.go
registers allocated at
	AX	0
	CX	0
	DX	0
	BX	0x4ce0fd
	SP	0
	BP	0x4ca962
	SI	0x4cd431
	DI	0x4cffab
registers allocated at
	AX	0
	CX	0
	DX	0
	BX	0x4ce0fd
	SP	0
	BP	0x4ca962
	SI	0x4cd431
	DI	0x4cff1d
src.go:116: out of fixed registers
src.go:116: internal compiler error: regfree: reg not allocated
